document_data.name: Xzand're Hsyl'ran
document_data.mainbody: and're was an clever and creative woman, but suffered from overconfidence.
document_data.Personality: Xzand're was an clever and creative woman, but suffered from overconfidence.
document_data.Possessions: Xzand're possessed a ''[[hat of disguise]]'', which looked like a red [[silk]] ribbon embroidered with [[gold]] thread. She used it to take the appearance of [[Meggin]] the innkeeper.{{Cite adventurers league/Dock Ward Double Cross|9,13}}
document_data.Activities: Xzand're ran a smuggling ring in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of Waterdeep. In addition she managed the [[Ship's Prow]] tavern under the guise of Meggin, one of her victims.
document_data.Relationships: Xzand're was deeply loyal to [[Jarlaxle Baenre]], but lost his favors. In an attempt to regain his good graces, she distributed false treasure [[map]]s to thwart his competitors while he was looking for [[Dagult Neverember]]'s [[Dragon (coin)|dragon]] cache.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{yearlinkName|1492}},{{Waterdeep-time}} Xzand're assassinated Meggin in order to take over her inn. She kept the young woman's corpse [[salt]]ed, in a barrel, within a hidden room in the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|the city's sewers]] below her shop.{{Cite adventurers league/Dock Ward Double Cross|22}}
